long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Productivity tools for Netsuite.

This extension adds some limited functionality to Netsuite. On the user dashboard one cannot easily copy the bank reconciliation report and get the last reconciled dates and balances for each of the bank accounts. This extension adds a button to copy the table in a pretty format to paste into Excel.
